long_description: The women's lightweight ExOfficio BugsAway(R) Lumen T-Shirt is made from an open-mesh weave that's ideal for hot buggy days when you need to stay both cool and protected. Fabric consists of polyester/cotton jersey on main body and mesh-ventilated sleeves and yoke; tee is quick drying, moisture wicking, lightweight and easy care. BugsAway Insect Shield(R) clothing repels mosquitoes (including those carrying West Nile virus and malaria), ticks, ants, flies, chiggers and midges or no-see-ums. Insect Shield uses permethrin which is a man-made version of a natural insect repellent found in a type of chrysanthemum plant. Forward-facing shoulder seams feel comfortable under pack straps. Interior foldover pocket holds a card or key. Flatlock seams ensure chafe-free comfort. ExOfficio BugsAway Lumen T-Shirt features a non-irritating tagless label. Insect Shield(R) Repellent Apparel is effective through 70 washes.
short_description: The women's lightweight ExOfficio BugsAway(R) Lumen T-Shirt is made from an open-mesh weave that's ideal for hot buggy days when you need to stay both cool and protected.
